Des_Plaines.Schiller Park station: Schiller Park is a station on Metra's North Central Service in Schiller Park, Illinois. The station is 17.4 miles (28.0 km) away from Union Station, the southern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Schiller Park is in zone C. Schiller Park was opened on January 30, 2006, along with three other new stations on the North Central Service.
